name: The Other One
description:
Acrylic painting on masonite, size 4' x 4' mounted on 1" x 2" wood frame painted white. The painting was created by two painting done in acrylic on canvas, one painting was a race car, and the second was portrait. I cut both of these painting up into squares, painted the masonite white, then swirl of color using acrylic. I dumped all the canvas pieces out and started hot gluing them down as fast as possible.
You can see the whole story on my Blog: www.clarkwalker.net
